title: Winning a 4v5
body:
Good job, you won with your 5 against our 4.

Congrats

Well done

Would you like a cookie?

Gloating in that situation will only merit you a report, and (hopefully) a ban.

replies.body:
Winning a 4v5 should grant everyone on your team a chest.

Or a key. Or at least an S.
Honestly might give some players more reason to try when you are past the remake window.
And less incentive to say "Screw it" and afk themselves.

Not 1 or 2, but definitely reduced.

MMR creates "balanced" 5v5 games. So to be a man down is a huge hit (although sometimes it works out by luck).

Let's say I have a feeling I'll lose anyway and I really dislike the enemy team. I can go afk as a middle finger to them so that when the enemy team does win they'll get reduced LP. 

There's no need for any of that. Since everyone is as liable to get AFKs in their team as everyone else, over time the free wins balance out the free losses. Free losses/wins may be frustrating, but they're statistically irrelevant because of this balance. Stuff like that only stimulates people to try to game the system.
